articles.title: Aston Martin Plans 4 New Electric Models, Will Use Motors Supplied By Lucid
articles.description: Aston Martin has shocked its normal engine supplier, Mercedes AMG, by choosing Lucid to supply power for its electric cars.
articles.content: There aren’t many CleanTechnica readers planning to buy an Aston Martin. Aston Martin’s ultra-high-performance cars look terrific in James Bond movies, but are OMG expensive to the point that they ar… [+7012 chars]
